statements: SELECT * FROM GenomicSequences;
SELECT sequence, species_name FROM GenomicSequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, species_name, sequence_source FROM GenomicSequences WHERE species_name = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM GenomicSequences WHERE sequence_source = 'NCBI' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, species_name FROM GenomicSequences ORDER BY species_name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenomicSequences WHERE species_name = 'Human';
SELECT id, species_name FROM GenomicSequences WHERE sequence_source = 'NCBI' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sequences FROM GenomicSequences;
SELECT sequence, species_name FROM GenomicSequences WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT DISTINCT species_name FROM GenomicSequences ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sequence;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM Sequence WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM Sequence ORDER BY sequence_name ASC;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM Sequence WHERE sequence_data LIKE '%important%';
SELECT relationship_id, relationship_type FROM Relationship WHERE sequence1_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Sequence WHERE sequence_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM Sequence WHERE sequence_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Sequence WHERE sequence_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT sequence_name, relationship_type FROM Sequence JOIN Relationship ON Sequence.sequence_id = Relationship.sequence1_id;
SELECT Sequence.sequence_name, Relationship.relationship_type FROM Sequence JOIN Relationship ON Sequence.sequence_id = Relationship.sequence2_id;
SELECT * FROM Sequence;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM Sequence WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sequence_name FROM Sequence WHERE sequence_data LIKE '%pattern%';
SELECT * FROM EvolutionaryRelationships ORDER BY relationship_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComparisonResults WHERE similarity_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Sequence WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM Sequence WHERE sequence_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT Sequence.sequence_name, ComparisonResults.similarity_score FROM Sequence INNER JOIN ComparisonResults ON ComparisonResults.relationship_id = EvolutionaryRelationships.relationship_id WHERE sequence_data IS NOT NULL;

SELECT Sequence.sequence_name, EvolutionaryRelationships.relationship_type, ComparisonResults.similarity_score FROM Sequence INNER JOIN EvolutionaryRelationships ON Sequence.id = EvolutionaryRelationships.sequence1_id INNER JOIN ComparisonResults ON EvolutionaryRelationships.relationship_id = ComparisonResults.relationship_id;
SELECT * FROM ComparisonResults WHERE similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM gene_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 2;
SELECT alignment_id, sequence_id, alignment_data FROM gene_alignments ORDER BY alignment_id DESC;
SELECT sequence_id, COUNT(*) AS alignment_count FROM gene_alignments GROUP BY sequence_id;
SELECT sequence_id, evolution_distance FROM evolutionary_relationships WHERE evolution_distance > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM gene_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence FROM gene_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT species_id, species_name, average_evolution_distance FROM species WHERE average_evolution_distance > 0.5;
SELECT gene_alignments.alignment_id, gene_sequences.sequence FROM gene_alignments LEFT JOIN gene_sequences ON gene_alignments.sequence_id = gene_sequences.sequence_id;

SELECT evolutionary_relationships.evolution_distance, gene_alignments.alignment_data FROM evolutionary_relationships JOIN gene_alignments ON evolutionary_relationships.alignment_id = gene_alignments.alignment_id ORDER BY evolutionary_relationships.evolution_distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM Genomes;
SELECT species_name, sequence FROM Genomes WHERE genome_id = 1;
SELECT mutation_type, mutation_position FROM Mutations WHERE genome_id = 2;
SELECT genome1_id, genome2_id, similarity_score FROM EvolutionaryRelationships ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT tree_name, tree_structure FROM PhylogeneticTrees WHERE tree_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM Genomes ORDER BY genome_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, sequence FROM Genomes WHERE species_name LIKE 'H%' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT mutation_type, mutation_position FROM Mutations WHERE mutation_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT genome1_id, genome2_id, similarity_score FROM EvolutionaryRelationships WHERE similarity_score > 0.9 ORDER BY similarity_score DESC;
SELECT tree_name, tree_structure FROM PhylogeneticTrees WHERE tree_name = 'Tree1';
